abstract: New York Blood Center calls on New Yorkers to donate in order to make up for some 3,000 scheduled donations in region that were cancelled amid winter storm.
lead_paragraph: The New York Blood Center is seeking to make up about 3,000 scheduled donations that were canceled because of the snowstorm this week.
snippet: The New York Blood Center is seeking to make up about 3,000 scheduled donations that were canceled because of the snowstorm this week.

headline.main: New York Blood Donations Are Sought After Storm Disrupts Giving
headline.print_headline: Blood Donations Are Sought After Storm Disrupts Giving
